segments.text: Hi , Sally ! You are talking to the proud father of a new baby girl !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Congratulations , Bob ! That ’ s great news , what ’ s her name ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We ’ Ve named her Alice after my wife ’ s grandmother .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s a pretty name . Give your wife my best !
segments.speaker: S2
